jsonBody.headline: YRC Lenders Agree to Extend Trucker’s Debt Terms
jsonBody.summary: YRC Worldwide’s lenders gave the troubled trucker a three-and-a-half year reprieve on its heavy debt load as the company prepares for a $700 million federal bailout package.

jsonBody.headline: Have Money You're Waiting to Invest? Buy These 2 Stocks When the Market Pulls Back
jsonBody.summary: Home Depot (NYSE: HD) proved to be resilient during the pandemic.  Importantly, in the post-pandemic long run, Home Depot can stave off Amazon from encroaching on its business.  The initiative aims to make it easier for customers to order online and pick up in-store, for example, which is a more profitable transaction for Home Depot compared to shipping.

jsonBody.headline: Have Money You're Waiting to Invest? Buy These 2 Stocks When the Market Pulls Back | The Motley Fool
jsonBody.summary: Investing in proven winners during market crashes is a recipe for success.

jsonBody.headline: Businesses, sick of policing mask use to prevent coronavirus, ask government to step in
jsonBody.summary: Faced with a dearth of government rules, corporations are mandating their own face mask policies to protect customers and staff from Covid-19.
